com.flopsar.api.agent

Class AgentConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flopsar.api.agent.AgentConnection

  • public class AgentConnection
extends Object
    Agent class which allows submitting user defined metric data to the Flopsar Database.
    Since:
    2.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String buildKey(String... element)
      Builds a valid KV data key from a set of elements.
      void close()
      Closes all the connections.

      Checks if the connection to the Manager is established.

      Sets up logging.
      void submitAsKV(String key, long timestamp, long value)
      Submits a key-value metric to a database.

      Submits a metric, that is represented as a root call.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setupLogger

        public static void setupLogger(String loggerDirectory,
                               int logSize,
                               AbstractLoggerLevel level)
        Sets up logging. This method must be called prior to createConnection.
        Parameters:
        loggerDirectory - Path to a directory, which logs will be stored in.
        logSize - Log size in mega bytes.
        level - Logger level.

      • createConnection

        public static AgentConnection createConnection(String flopsarId,
                                               InetSocketAddress address)
        Creates a new AgentConnection object and connects to Flopsar Manager asynchronously. The method returns immediately, so you must make sure the connection is established by calling isConnected method.
        Parameters:
        flopsarId - Agent identifier. Must be unique across all agents of this type.
        address - Socket address of the Manager.
        Returns:
        Connection object.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if one of the conditions is satisfied:
        • address is null

      • close

        public final void close()
        Closes all the connections.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Checks if the connection to the Manager is established.
        Returns:
        true if the agent is connected to the manager, otherwise false.

      • submitAsKV

        public final void submitAsKV(String key,
                             long timestamp,
                             long value)
        Submits a key-value metric to a database.
        Parameters:
        key - Metric key.
        timestamp - Metric timestamp.
        value - Metric value.

      • buildKey

        public final String buildKey(String... element)
        Builds a valid KV data key from a set of elements.
        Parameters:
        element - Array of elements.
        Returns:
        KV data key that can be used as the key argument of the submitAsKV method.

      • submitAsStack

        public final void submitAsStack(String name,
                                String signature,
                                long timestamp,
                                int duration,
                                Map<String,String> parameters)
        Submits a metric, that is represented as a root call.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the metric.
        signature - Signature of the metric.
        timestamp - Timestamp of the metric.
        duration - Duration time in milliseconds of the metric.
        parameters - a map of parameters in a form of key-value.
